sentence.Network_en: He is bitter about the inaction of the other political parties.
sentence.Network_cn: 对其他政党的无作为他多有挖苦。

sentence.Network_en: The shame which he suffered as a result of his inaction recalled him to a sense of duty.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于懒散而使蒙受的耻辱迫使他恢复了责任感.

sentence.Network_en: Consider what I did - I who so loved repose and inaction.
sentence.Network_cn: 我是个爱好安逸、不好活动的人,可是想想看我干了件什么事.

entry.def: If you refer to someone's inaction, you disapprove of the fact that they are doing nothing.

example.ex: He is bitter about the inaction of the other political parties.
example.tran: 对其他政党的无作为他多有挖苦。

auth_sentence.content: Too often, uncertainty becomes an alibi for inaction.
auth_sentence.res_content: Too often, uncertainty becomes an alibi for inaction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Too often, uncertainty becomes an alibi for inaction.

auth_sentence.content: Some users point to council inaction rather than ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some users point to council inaction rather than ignorance.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some users point to council inaction rather than ignorance.

auth_sentence.content: The inaction everywhere else in the government is apparent.
auth_sentence.res_content: The inaction everywhere else in the government is apparent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The inaction everywhere else in the government is apparent.

sentences.en: The shame which he suffered as a result of his inaction recalled him to a sense of duty.
sentences.cn: 由于懒散而使蒙受的耻辱迫使他恢复了责任感。
